owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

stakeOnBehalf(address).details: Stake on behalf of @param who Account to stake for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: returns account of @param who : any valid address

documentation.text: @dev Mapping of rounds to stake vault

@dev Stake Celo for token reward.
 - The amount of Celo sent along the call must be greater 
      than the minimum staking amount.
 - We check if caller has existing account otherwise we 
      create a new account for them.
 - We can make a dynamic staking i.e stakers can stake any amount
      Celo, anytime. Each stake is unique to another in timing and
      identity.
@dev Stake on behalf of @param who Account to stake for
Mint rewardToken to staker on staking receipt
@dev returns account of @param who : any valid address
